Title: Monchhichiisu
Description: ["The CG anime series is based on Sekiguchi Corporation's line of stuffed toy monkeys. Ashi Productions previously produced the ", Monchichi, the Twins, ' television anime series that aired in 1980. An American-produced animated series titled ', Monchhichis, ' also aired in the 1980s.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
